## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                           | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `fixed`  | `fixed`   | If `true`, the grid will have a fixed width based on the screen size. | `boolean` | `false` |
